readable.title: 760180310_3c6bd4fd1f
readable.content: A baby lays next to a big brown dog on a palid bed cover . A large dog lays next to a small baby with a pacifier in its mouth . Baby with pacifier and brown dog lay together on the blanket . Naked baby with a pacifier in its mouth is laying next to a brown and black dog . The baby is lying on the floor next to the dog .
